headers.subject: Sponsor page
headers.received: (from crawler@localhost) by crawl-1.a.markmail.int (8.13.8/8.13.8/Submit) id m836Hqov005724 for hilario.fields.miller@a.markmail.org; Tue, 2 Sep 2008 23:17:52 -0700

body.footer: I created a sponsor page on my site that houses the adsense ads. Is this going to cause problems with CTR getting too high because people bothering to go to a page called sponsors would only go to click on ads? Is it breach of the TOS that I sectioned it off that way? I couldn't find anything to say it is a breach, but I don't want any problems. My site is brand new so it gets very few views as of yet (most of them are my own). Google crawled it for the first time last week, so I don't expect it to get many hits anytime soon, but I really want to prevent any problems. Any input would be greatly appreciated. My site is www.americanstylelandscaping.com Thanks much.
